entities.name: wand
entities.description: The object being discussed is a wand, specifically Harry's wand that snapped.

entities.name: you-know-who
entities.description: You-Know-Who refers to Voldemort, the main antagonist of the story.

relationships.description: The wand belonged to You-Know-Who, as it is implied that he was the one who realized Harry's wand had done something strange.
